sentences.en: Both men continually bad-mouthed each other.
sentences.cn: 两个人都在背地里频繁地互相攻击。

sentences.en: He continually cracked his whip and shouted at the mule.
sentences.cn: 他不住地挥响着鞭子,吆喝牲口.

sentences.en: I had been writing him continually, trying to get him to call me.
sentences.cn: 我一直在给他写信，想让他给我打电话。

sentences.en: I had continually pushed my doubts to the darker recesses of my mind.
sentences.cn: 我一直把怀疑深深地隐藏在心中.

sentences.en: If you continually question why he included this section at all, then you will be frustrated.
sentences.cn: 如果您不断地询问他究竟为什么要包含此部分，那么您将感到失落。

sentences.en: Malcolm was continually changing his mind.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆不断地改主意。

sentences.en: My brain is continually on the rack about the means of living.
On the chilly seas, Keats became feverish, continually coughing up blood.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷彻骨的海上，基茨开始发烧，不断地咯血。

sentences.en: Sarah had been plagued continually by a series of minor illnesses.
She continually harps on lack of money.
She cried almost continually and threw temper tantrums.
sentences.cn: 她几乎哭个没完，还大发脾气。

sentences.en: She is continually abusing her position by getting other people to do things for her.
sentences.cn: 她不断地滥用职权,让别人为她做事.

sentences.en: The child continually disturbs the class.
sentences.cn: 那孩子老是扰乱课堂秩序.

sentences.en: The children continually disturbed the class.
sentences.cn: 孩子们不停地扰乱课堂.

sentences.en: The desert continually encroaches on the fertile land.
sentences.cn: 沙漠在不断地侵蚀肥沃土地。

sentences.en: The other kids continually taunted him about his size.
sentences.cn: 其他孩子不断地耻笑他的个头儿。

sentences.en: The US is continually building up its armed forces.
sentences.cn: 美军正持续加强它的三军.

words.tran_cn: 连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的

trans.tran_cn: 不停地，持续地，屡屡地，一再地
